The primary study objective determine mean change absolute weight Day 28 compare baseline normal healthy male volunteer treat risperidone plus mifepristone risperidone alone . The secondary study objective determine mean percent change baseline body weight ; proportion subject gain le 5 % le 7 % baseline body treatment group .
